divs: Sighting DetailsI was on an annual trip to New York with university, me and a friend decided to walk from the Meat packing district, into the Financial district to shoot some images, we saw a man feeding birds and began to shoot as many images as we could without ever really checking the view finder. I got back and scanned my images, I was amazed to find this image with an unusual disc like shape in the top left corner. I developed the film and scanned it whilst I was in America and owned a 40mb tiff file, but, when we went through customs at JFK I got stopped because of the amount of expensive photography equipment in my bag, they thought I bought most of it in NY. They asked too look at my external hard drive and I gave them permission. They came back to me about an hour later and seized all of my equipment, telling me my images were 'suspicious' A few days later and I get a letter telling me my photographic equipment is on its way home but none of my work from the trip is. The image i did manage to get was taken using a friends phone, I obviously had to bring it into photoshop in an attempt to bring out as much detail as I could, to do this i had to turn the image black and white to bump the contrast and sharpen the detail. I hope you can help me out with this one, I've been though a lot just to get this image on here.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around November 19th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I was photographing a man feeding birds, I didnt notice the object at the time.
